attributes.comment:
I don't understand why the cost for filing the I-600/I-600A has increased so
dramatically. It would seem to me that with greater volume there should be
greater efficiency. At least that's the way it works in the real world. There is
absolutely no reason that such a huge increase should be required, especially
since many families are now having to pay the fees twice.

This fee increase only shows the glowing inefficiencies in USCIS. I'll gladly do the
processing for $500 per applicant. I could hire staff and still make a good profit.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by John T Rich
